title: joker_josue
author: joker_josue
content: Hoje encontrei o primeiro anuncio (que eu tenha visto) em Portugal.Eles estão a realizar uma campanha chamada "Wonders of Portugal", que oferecem um NFT sobre Portugal.A campanha decorre até ao final do mês, e tem as seguintes regras:Quote· Activity Period: 2022-06-15 00:00 (UTC) to 2022-06-30 23:59 (UTC)· Exclusive to individuals who are in Portugal during the time of the activity. Scan the QR code with your phone camera or your Binance app to claim a unique “Wonders of Portugal” NFT Mystery Box.· Binance NFT might release new utilities for users who hold the “Wonders of Portugal” NFTs at a later stage, such as being whitelisted for future exclusive launches and eligibility to join Subscription Mechanism sales.· New users have to  during the activity period. Both new and existing users will be required to  during the activity period, in order to transfer, list and trade the NFTs on the Binance NFT secondary market.· The Mystery Boxes can only be listed on the Binance NFT secondary market once users have claimed them successfully and completed the KYC.· Each UID is only eligible to claim 1 “Wonders of Portugal” NFT.· Users can claim the “Wonders of Portugal” Mystery Box by scanning the “Wonders of Portugal” QR code. The claimed Mystery Box can be found via Binance NFT > User Center > Mystery Box.· The NFT Mystery Boxes for these activities are to be claimed on a first-come first-served basis, with limited quantities available.· Binance reserves the right to disqualify any participants showing signs of fraudulent behavior immediately.· Binance reserves the right to disqualify trades that are deemed to be illegally bulk registered accounts.· Binance reserves the right at any time in its sole and absolute discretion to determine and/or amend or vary these terms and conditions without prior notice, including but not limited to canceling, extending, terminating or suspending this Promotion, the eligibility terms and criteria, the selection and number of winners, and the timing of any act to be done, and all Participants shall be bound by these amendments.· Where any discrepancy arises between the translated versions and the original English version, the English version shall prevail.Risk warning: Cryptocurrency trading is subject to high market risk. Please make your trades cautiously. You are advised that Binance is not responsible for your trading losses.Quem está em Portugal, que aproveite.https://www.binance.com/en/nft/activity?subActivityCode=588638570391695360&isActivity=1

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: Como está  a situação de saque de EUROS pela binance de portugal?Com minha conta brasileira, não é permitido transferir euros, mesmo que eu tenha uma conta bancária num banco que receba SEPA. Aparece uma mensagem diznedo "de acordo com nossos termos, essa retirada não é permitida na sua localização"

comments.author: joker_josue
comments.body: Quote from: bitmover on June 27, 2022, 12:03:29 PMComo está  a situação de saque de EUROS pela binance de portugal?Com minha conta brasileira, não é permitido transferir euros, mesmo que eu tenha uma conta bancária num banco que receba SEPA. Aparece uma mensagem diznedo "de acordo com nossos termos, essa retirada não é permitida na sua localização"Pelo o que sei, esta a funcionar normalmente.Mas julgo que é preciso que a conta seja verificada em países do EEE-Espaço Econômico Europeu ou do Reino Unido. Até porque eles solicitam que seja apresentado um comprovativo de morada.https://www.binance.com/pt-BR/support/announcement/6bd5763ecaa04a4a87b2ef0053842207

comments.author: darkv0rt3x
comments.body: Estas campanhas a publicitar shitcoinery... Se promovessem mas era uns worshops sobre Bitcoin é que tinham juízo! Tivesse eu possibilidades e faria mais workshops em Portugal.
